DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find whether electrical stimulation reduce knee pain increase function people osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.criteria: 50 year age old Diagnosis primary osteoarthritis knee ( defined American College Rheumatology criterion ) Knee pain least six month duration Moderate great knee pain ( define score 3 great 11 point numeric pain rating scale ) day last month Willing abide protocol treatment schedule . Implants , pacemaker , TENS , insulin pump , incompatible electrical stimulation Uncontrolled concomitant disease affect knee , : rheumatoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythema , psoriatic arthritis Pregnant breastfeeding Intraarticular corticosteroid hyaluronic acid injection knee within 3 month precede study Arthroscopy knee within past year Significant injury knee within past 6 month Use assistive device cane knee brace Disease spine low extremity joint sufficient degree affect assessment knee
